programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: A Hong Kong drama written & directed by Kearen Pang, former talent manager Mei Fung retired to take care of her husband & son, but decides to return to work to find her value in life.

programme.title: High Forces
programme.desc: An A380 airliner is hijacked by gunmen on its maiden flight. Among the passengers is a security expert, whose daughter is one of the captives. Can he save all the passengers and avert the crisis?

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: Sing, the SDU's top killer, is assigned by his superior to an unusual assignment - going undercover to locate his Chief's missing gun in high school.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Soon after an important financial document is stolen from the computer of analyst Siu-yu, her boss receives an email demanding a relatively small ransom. Is this just the tip of an iceberg?

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng, Vic Chow, Raymond Lam & Wu Chun, star in this tale that depicts how the seven sons of General Yang set out to rescue their father from an army of thousands.

programme.title: Marrying Mr. Perfect
programme.desc: Heartbroken after a breakup, a woman meets a rich tycoon who is under disguise as his driver to escape his conflict. They fall in love soon after, with her completely ignorant of his true identity.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: Detective Lin sets up a special unit to investigate the crime syndicate behind a series of thefts. In the process, his pregnant wife is attacked, leading him to uncover their revenge plan.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat stars as a retired gambling genius who is challenged to a high stakes game to elicit his kidnapped daughter's freedom.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A computer geek who has only been in love once suddenly & surprisingly finds himself getting romantically involved with five different women. Will he find "the-one"?

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who can enter a person's subconscious. As she investigates a murder-cum-suicide case, she finds herself under suspicion and comes face-to-face with a past trauma...

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: A demoted super cop who has become overweight receives a lifeline to save his career and win back his ex-fiancee when he is tasked to repatriate a Japanese fugitive.

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: A Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: In this Golden Horse winner starring Gordon Lam, a retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian drug mule.

programme.title: Sifu VS Vampire
programme.desc: In a selfish grasp at financial gain, a TV station tycoon intimidates a feng shui master into relocating his great grandfather's coffin - and pays the price.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: When an engaged couple is requested to invite their parents for a CNY client event, the fiance - who is estranged from his mother, fakes a family. However, things spiral out of control.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Director Jingle Ma reunites with Tony Leung for the 3rd instalment of the Raider's series, revolving the adventure of 2 top bounty hunters as they search for the destructive missile called Hand of God.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: A top-rated film based on a true case in Hong Kong, it tells of a young man who plots with his friend to murder & dismember his parents, resulting in a highly controversial court case.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a girl named Suki aspire to fulfill her dream after leaving with her cheating boyfriend. Later, when invited to attend his wedding, she schemes to have her revenge.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: A veteran and a passionate street dancer both strive to reach their goals and pursue their dreams in street dancing. After overcoming many challenges, can they finally shine on stage?

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of prison corruption to the ICAC. ICAC officer Luk goes undercover in prison to investigate and is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Hong Kong Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee, a production head of an advertising firm, runs into her ex-boyfriend before a commercial shoot & drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong. She picks herself up with Chan's help.

programme.title: Crisis Negotiators
programme.desc: Negotiator Wai is framed for murder. He takes hostages at the police station and demands talk with a former negotiator. As they engage in a tense battle of wits, their perspectives gradually shift.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred & Flora are a married couple with a gambling addiction. During their divorce, to decide who gets their daughter's custody right, the judge orders the couple to quit gambling for a week.

programme.title: The Fierce Wife
programme.desc: An Zhen divorces her husband after his infidelity but faces a pivotal decision four years later - to return to her cheating husband and old life or to embark on a new life with a new love?

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2012
programme.desc: Featuring an all HK-star cast, this movie depicts how a weatherman is faced with the biggest challenge of his life when he receives a shocking forecast.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: When a school bus driver is injured after risking his life to save a boy during an accident, the boy's father invites him to live with them. However, disturbing facts soon begin to emerge.
